p: Overall, the median time to end of outbreaks improved, decreasing from 131 (IQR 67–237) days in 2017 to 67 (IQR 25–144) days in 2018 and to 45 (IQR 22–90) days in 2019 ( Table 1). The median time to detection decreased from 14 (IQR 6–37) days in 2017 to 7 days (IQR 1–27) days in 2018 and to 4 (IQR 1–11) days in 2019. The median time to notification increased over time from 1 (IQR 0–5) days in 2017 to 3 (IQR 0–14) days in 2018 and to 4 (IQR 1–9) days in 2019.
